synopsis.text: Z-Fighters brace for a new threat as an age-old vendetta resurfaces! Long before the Saiyans claimed Planet Vegeta as their own, they annihilated the Tsufurujin race and seized their technology. Unbeknownst to them, one Tsufurujin, Dr. Raichi, survived the onslaught. Harbouring an intense grudge against the Saiyans, he has devised a sinister plan to wipe out the remaining Saiyans on Earth, including Goku and Vegeta. Using a powerful machine, Dr. Raichi has created Ghost Warriors and unleashed a lethal gas called Destron, capable of eradicating all life on Earth. With just 72 hours to save their planet, Goku, Vegeta, and the rest of the Z-Fighters must find and eliminate Dr. Raichi and his destructive machines. As they race against time, they uncover a series of challenges that push their strength and determination to the limit. Will they succeed in stopping Dr. Raichi's revenge and safeguarding Earth? Join the Z-Fighters in this thrilling adventure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
